name: TechnoMage: Return of Eternity
notes:
Games starts...

Issues:
 - Backscreen in MainMenu
 - Press "Enter" in MainMenu, start game, skip Cutscene -> Game crushes
content:
game:
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/TechnoMage/Technomage.EXE
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: data1.cab
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win98
    description: Using Windows 98
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    executable: $DISC/Setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  Desktop: true
  WineDesktop: 1024x768
